chatbot.modules.v1.StreamingSettings.jso.description: StreamingSettings controls text streaming behavior for typing effects

textDelayMs.description:
Delay between text chunks in milliseconds (default: 15)
 Set to 0 for instant streaming without typing effect

typingEffectEnabled.description: Whether typing effect is enabled (default: true)

chatbot.modules.v1.StreamingSettings.jso.title: Streaming Settings
